title: Large-Scale Project Design Course Based on Sustainable Energy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of energy systems, environmental science, and corporate sustainability policies
context.additional_context: Sustainable energy solution development project executable in mobile-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can competency-based design sustainable energy project plans applicable in corporate settings.
Learners can evaluate project feasibility using core indicators in energy efficiency and renewable energy sectors.
Learners can implement team-based energy-saving solutions using mobile tools and quantify results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
